MyDelegate Interface Reference

Detailed Description

... 

    MQTTCFSocketTransport *transport = [[MQTTCFSocketTransport alloc] init];
    transport.host = @"localhost";
    transport.port = 1883;

    MQTTSession *session = [[MQTTSession alloc] init];
    session.transport = transport;

session.delegate = self;

[session connectAndWaitTimeout:30];  //this is part of the synchronous API
1 Subscribe to a topic:
2 
3 ```objective-c
4 [session subscribeToTopic:@"example/#" atLevel:2 subscribeHandler:^(NSError *error, NSArray<NSNumber *> *gQoss){
5  if (error) {
6  NSLog(@"Subscription failed %@", error.localizedDescription);
7  } else {
8  NSLog(@"Subscription sucessfull! Granted Qos: %@", gQoss);
9  }
10  }]; // this is part of the block API

Add the following to receive messages for the subscribed topics

1  - (void)newMessage:(MQTTSession *)session
2  data:(NSData *)data
3  onTopic:(NSString *)topic
4  qos:(MQTTQosLevel)qos
5  retained:(BOOL)retained
6  mid:(unsigned int)mid {
7  // this is one of the delegate callbacks
8 }

Publish a message to a topic:

1 [session publishAndWaitData:data
2  onTopic:@"topic"
3  retain:NO
4  qos:MQTTQosLevelAtLeastOnce]; // this is part of the asynchronous API
